text: @LtGovDanForest @DanForestNC I was never a fan of Roy Cooper. From the beginning his liberal agenda overruled what was best for #northCarolina. Now his need to control our lives is dictating his every move dealing w/ #Covid19 ...He must be defeated and removed from office. #2020Elections #TurnIteRed
